info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:23PM MDT until July 04 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL TELLER AND NORTHWESTERN EL PASO COUNTIES... At 423 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chipita Park, or 10 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Western Colorado Springs, Air Force Academy, Manitou Springs, Green Mountain Falls, Pikes Peak, Crystola, Chipita Park and Cascade. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
